subject: Philosophy
title: Why Philosophy Still Matters
description: A 60-second lesson on Why Philosophy Still Matters.

hook.text: People call philosophy useless. Meanwhile, every courtroom and lab relies on it.

buildup.text: Medical ethics, human rights, and the scientific method all began as philosophical arguments.

discovery.text: Tech companies now hire ethicists to decide what AI should and shouldn't do.

twist.text: The 'useless' subject is quietly shaping the rules of the 21st century.

climax.text: Philosophy doesn't build bridges. It decides whether they should be built at all.

punchline.text: The questions haven't changed. The stakes have.

quiz.question: Why are tech companies increasingly hiring philosophers?
options: To guide ethical decisions around AI
